dcterms:creator: C. Veaux
J. Yamagishi
K. MacDonald
dcterms:description: The VCTK Corpus is an English multi-speaker corpus used for training text-to-speech systems, consisting of recordings from 100 speakers reading the same script.
dcterms:title: VCTK Corpus

dcterms:creator: C. Yang
G. Brown
L. Lu
J. Yamagishi
S. King
dcterms:description: The CSTR Whisper TIMIT Plus Corpus contains whispered speech recordings, specifically designed for noise-robust whispered speech recognition.
dcterms:title: CSTR Whisper TIMIT Plus Corpus

dcterms:creator: M. Cooke
C. Mayo
C. Valentini-Botinhao
dcterms:description: The Hurricane Natural Speech Corpus is designed to enhance speech intelligibility through various modifications, containing recordings selected from the Harvard collection.
dcterms:title: Hurricane Natural Speech Corpus

dcterms:description: An internal dataset consisting of recordings from an American English male speaker, used for training speech synthesis models.
dcterms:title: Internal Dataset of an American English Male Speaker
